data.name: The Worlds of Aria
data.detailed_description:
The Worlds of Aria is a video game to be released on PC and Mac. It is a new kind of narrative video game, taking place in the worlds of Aria: a fantasy universe imagined by FibreTigre and popularized by the Game of Roles show.

Through a new system of choices, which will have direct consequences on your story, live unique adventures, alone or with others.

Investigate in the streets of Aria, survive the dangerous lands of Osmanlia, sail to the Phoenix continent or confront the Dragon Wizard King...



Play with your friends in the world of Game of Roles

Aria's Worlds is a narrative game, for 1 to 4 players, which reproduces the spirit of a tabletop role-playing game. Dice rolling, skills and character classes will be part of the game.

The adventure places you around a role-playing table, lulled by the voice of a game master, who will guide you through your adventures. These adventures will lead you to the discovery of the iconic territories of the show: The Kingdom of Aria of course, but also Mirabilia, the continent of Phoenix or Osmanlie!



For 1 to 4 players

Alone or in a group, online or locally, form your group of adventurers and live your own adventure!

The One For All: a new game system

The Worlds of Aria allows you to live your own adventures through a system of choices that affect the rest of the story. The One For All system, developed by the Ludogram studio, allows each individual decision to be taken into account in order to achieve a custom result.

Each game will be unique, for an infinite number of possible combinations!

data.supported_languages:
French*, English
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.8Ghz CPU Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Cart

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.9 or higher
  • Processor: 2.4GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4600, NVIDIA GeForce GT 630, Radeon HD 5670
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
